publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1716 Ross Finnie: The Draft Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000 (Modification of National Parks (Scotland) Act 2000) Order 2004â€”That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000 (Modification of National Parks (Scotland) Act 2000) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
